name: BulletHellJam 2022
description:
Thank you for  choosing to play my game RGB ESC . I made it for the Bullet hell Jam 2020 which was 7 days long but I could only work on it for 4 days.

 It is about a Good Robot that must escape the facility that he is captured in by the EVIL Robot RGB.

Art GameArt 2D

The Robot /Player character
